about_the_game:
Help Santa set up the Automated Present Delivery Terminal and deliver four presents for four very special ladies...
And remember, those who give generously shall recieve generous gifts as well ;)



Enjoy this bonus episode for Lockdown Lewd UP!

content_descriptors.notes:
Lockdown Lewd UP! contains adult themes and content that is only suitable for certain ages. Characters are shown in frisky situations and there's frequent adult humor abound.

All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 21.

name: Lockdown Lewd UP! ❤️ Christmas Lewd UP! 🎄

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (6.1.7601) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 4th Gen or similiar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 Display recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
